faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We support most common video formats including MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, and WebM. Audio files like MP3, WAV, and M4A are also supported. Maximum file size is 1GB.
faq.a2: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy for clear audio in English and Russian. The quality depends on audio clarity and background noise. You can always edit the transcription after processing.
faq.a3: Processing time depends on video length. Typically, a 60-minute video takes 5-10 minutes to transcribe. You'll receive an email notification when it's ready.
faq.a4: Yes! All uploads are encrypted in transit and at rest. We don't share your data with third parties. You can delete your data at any time from your account settings.
faq.q5: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a5: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
